snippet: President Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi replaced nearly 20 top military officers on Friday, including a half brother of former President Ali Abdullah Saleh, the official Saba news agency reported.
abstract: Saba news agency reports that Yemeni Pres Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi has replaced nearly 20 top military officers, including a half brother of former president Ali Abdullah Saleh.
lead_paragraph: President Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi replaced nearly 20 top military officers on Friday, including a half brother of former President Ali Abdullah Saleh, the official Saba news agency reported.

headline.main: Yemen: A Shake-Up in the Military
headline.print_headline: Yemen: A Shake-Up in the Military
